verses.verse: Then <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> in <S%H7965>safety<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6440>meet<s%> him and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "Should you <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H2088>so<s%> [bring] <S%H7110>wrath<s%> on yourself from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?

"But <S%H4672>there<s%> is [some] <S%H2896>good<s%> in you, for you have <S%H1197>removed<s%> the <S%H842>Asheroth<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> and you have <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

So <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H7725>again<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers.

And he <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H7200>"Consider<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> you are <S%H6213>doing,<s%> for you do not <S%H8199>judge<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> but for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who is with you when you <S%H1697>render<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then let the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be upon you; be very <S%H8104>careful<s%> what you <S%H6213>do,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> part in <S%H9390>unrighteousness,<s%> or <S%H5375>partiality,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> or the <S%H4727>taking<s%> of a <S%H7810>bribe.<s%>"

And in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and to <S%H7378>judge<s%> <S%H7379>disputes<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then he <S%H6680>charged<s%> them <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%> and <S%H3824>wholeheartedly.<s%> <S%H8003><s%>

"And <S%H834>whenever<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7379>dispute<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to you from your <S%H251>brethren<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> you shall <S%H2094>warn<s%> them that they may not be <S%H816>guilty<s%> before the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> may [not] <S%H1961>come<s%> on you and your <S%H251>brethren.<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> and you will not be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> will be <S%H5921>over<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1697>pertains<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1697>pertains<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> Also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you. <S%H6213>Act<s%> <S%H2388>resolutely,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be with the <S%H2896>upright.<s%>"
